## About

Prof. Geir Selbæk is a leading researcher in aging and dementia at the Norwegian National Advisory Unit on Ageing and Health. His research focuses on understanding the relationship between lifestyle factors and dementia risk.

## Research Interests

- Lifestyle interventions in dementia
- Risk factors for AD
- Prevention strategies
- Clinical epidemiology

## Selected Publications

- Selbæk G, et al. (2022). Lifestyle factors and dementia risk
- Selbæk G, et al. (2020). Prevention strategies in aging populations
- Selbæk G, et al. (2018). Risk factors for cognitive decline
